hero.title: Senate Passes Landmark Infrastructure Bill
hero.intro: In a rare display of bipartisan unity, the Senate has passed a comprehensive infrastructure bill aimed at modernizing the nation's transportation network and energy grid for the next decade.
hero.author: Emily Rodriguez
hero.contentLeft: The bill includes $1.2 trillion in new spending over five years, focusing on climate resilience and broadband.
hero.contentRight:
Analysts say this represents the most significant investment in American power since the mid-20th century.

The bill now heads to the President's desk for signing.

hero.title: Traditional Music in the Heart of Globalized World
hero.intro: In an increasingly connected world, traditional music faces both challenges and opportunities.
hero.author: Maxin Dalton
hero.contentLeft: Globalization can lead to the homogenization of sound, but also provides new platforms for regional artists.
hero.contentRight:

Music festivals are seeing a revival of ethnic genres.
